Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory330.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryHitNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Commandant, this way...', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Lucia steadily paves a path, coldly surveying for ambushes and cutting apart any approaching Corrupted.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Commandant? Please follow tight.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia, there are no more Corrupted around.', 3: '14'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Sorry, Commandant. I must look... uncanny right now...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'The symptoms of M.I.N.D. deviation are... showing...', 4: '2'}
{2: "Don't worry, I'll be here to keep you stable.", 3: '19'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Commandant...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I've heard that... maintaining close contact with your commandant can help stabilize M.I.N.D. integrity.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'But... with my condition now...', 4: '2'}
{2: "(Don't strain yourself, leave the navigation to me!)", 3: '27'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Then... I'll just follow you like this, Commandant... Is it alright...?", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg002_1.jpg'}
{3: 'After a short rest, you and Lucia reach your destination—a small area hidden by the ruins.'}
{3: 'Beneath the shadows stand a discontented-looking teenager, and...'}
{3: 'A somewhat reluctant and petite girl.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory5.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Lucia! You're hurt so badly... Commandant, you as well...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "It's not an issue. I've disconnected my pain receptors, so executing the mission will not be a problem.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "You've gone so far to...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Reckless beyond belief.', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'At least, we succeeded.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Yes, you did. But for this, you've been heavily wounded, our most important Commandant nearly died, and not only so, even Liv's lost her combat capabilities.", 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "I'm sorry, I overloaded my Levi-Guns for the blast just now and its core melted...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'But, I can still provide computing power and data support!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Just scorched from connecting the Levi-Gun to the city's power grid. Nothing serious, it doesn't affect its function.", 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Right, Commandant—', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "You'd likely require these, so I scavenged a few serums for you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Don't ask where I got them, you can probably guess.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "At least we've escaped from the Corrupted's ambush now. Let's continue with the plan, Lucia.", 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Yes. I'll reiterate first. Our mission is to recover City 015.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "When we're done exterminating the Corrupted from the designated areas, the Engineering Force will arrive and rebuild the city into a frontier for Humanity on Earth.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'But our conditions are dire, we must first regroup with other supply squads to resupply...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "And after a map update, I've found that the church nearby has a shortcut to the nearest meeting point. Let's head over there.", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory98.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Is something the matter with this church?', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Nothing, just struck by a sense of déjà vu...', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Occasionally... happens...', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Not an unusual occurrence. The M.I.N.D. system is a complete simulation of the human consciousness model after all.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Might be a remnant from one of the places you've been. You do have a vast amount of combat experience after all.", 4: '3'}
{2: "You've all had your fair share of battle.", 3: '104'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Commandant, you seem to have left yourself out.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Even though it's true that your resume doesn't stand out... but...", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Nevermind... We all have skeletons in the closet.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I'm fine now, let's continue.", 4: '2'}
